name: TriptoVR
summary: Travel the world in VR with TriptoVR!  Marvel at the view of Earth from space – rotate it, zoom in, and choose your trip. Visit the most beautiful and famous places on our planet. Go on a boat ride in Venice, stand in awe beneath the Eiffel Tower in Paris, and witness the Washington Monument. Bask in the sun of Cape Town, or immerse yourself in the bustling energy of Tokyo's famous Shibuya Crossing.  And there is much, much more to see and experience. The world is at your fingertips with TriptoVR.
